description: PM Modi reviews drought and water scarcity situation at high level meeting with Rajasthan CM Rajasthan CM Vasundhara Raje briefs PM Modi about Mukhyamantri Jal Swavlamban Abhiyan PM Modi calls for a
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Discussed at length the drought situation in Rajasthan & ways to improve drought & water scarcity during the meeting with CM Vasundhara Raje. 

CM briefed me on Mukhyamantri Jal Swavlamban Abhiyan & micro irrigation initiatives of State Govt. 

In our meeting Vasundhara ji shared an example of Bavdi revival in Nagore dist & said that State Govt will take it up on larger scale. http://nm-4.com/8z4o
